description.name: tusdtrc20
description.tagline: TrueUSD trc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto trc20-tusd Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept TrueUSD trc20 directly on your website
Unique trc20/tusd receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your trc20/tusd wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
